name: STASIS - 2D Isometric SciFi Horror Adventure Game.
blurb: STASIS -Classic point & click adventure game played from a unique isometric view point set in a science fiction universe in 2D.

rewards.reward: A very special THANK YOU! \r\nAccess to the 'backers only' posts in the Kickstarter/Stasis forum.\r\nYou will also get an exclusive Stasis desktop WALLPAPER.

DIGITAL EDITION
=============================
ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS &
the Digital GAME DOWNLOAD on release.
General Backer Credit in the game and on our website.

EXPANDED EDITION
=============================
ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS &
the SOUNDTRACK as a digital mp3/Ogg download.

DEVELOPERS EDITION
=============================
ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS &
the 'MAKING OF' Stasis digital video content download when the game is released, covering INTERVIEWS, the ART and GAME DESIGN of Stasis.

A Classic ADVENTURE GAME HINT BOOK as a digital PDF for download.

SILVER Backer Credit in the game and on our website.

BETA ACCESS
=============================
Same rewards as DEVELOPERS EDITION, but ACCESS TO THE STASIS BETA - You will be able to play the BETA of Stasis at least a month before we release it publicly. Your final comments will aid us to polish Stasis even further. You will also be listed as a BETA TESTER on our website and in the Stasis credits.

NOTE: This reward also applies to all tiers above $59.

CLASSIC EDITION
=============================
ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS &
A PHYSICAL BOX copy of the game on release.
The PHYSICAL CD of the soundtrack on release.
GOLD Backer Credit in the game and on our website.

CLASSIC EDITION DELUXE============================= \r\nSame rewards as the CLASSIC EDITION but you will also get an extra pretty version of the STASIS box. This Special Edition box has a foil design, embossed logo and polished high gloss surface. The Deluxe Box design is Kickstarter Exclusive and won't be available after the campaign ends. Reward Tiers above $99 will automatically receive the Deluxe box.

ULTIMATE EDITION
=============================
ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS &
A STASIS POLO SHIRT exclusive to this campaign.

COLLECTORS EDITION
=============================
ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS &
your boxed copy of Stasis will be SIGNED and numbered.
An exclusive STASIS CANVAS print, signed and numbered.
The DEAD BODY BONUS - your name on a corpse.
An EXTRA digital download on release.
UNOBTAINIUM CREDIT, the highest thanks possible on our website and in the game credits.

DEFINITIVE EDITION
=============================
god level $$$ support - THANKS!

Same rewards as the ULTIMATE EDITION.

You also get a 3D SCULPTURE of John, designed by Chris, and printed in hard black plastic.

Your boxed copy of Stasis will be SIGNED and numbered.

An exclusive STASIS CANVAS print, signed and numbered.

An EXTRA digital download on release.

UNOBTAINIUM CREDIT, the highest thanks possible on our website and in the game credits.

Your DEAD BODY DEFINITIVE REWARD will include as an extra; your PHOTOGRAPH, your blood type and a brief description of...YOU!

BLACK EDITION
=============================
Same rewards as the DEFINITIVE EDITION.

You ALSO get THE GROOMLAKE 3D SCULPTURE, printed in color (images on the left).

Plus a random (original) page from the spiral book
that Chris has used as the Design Document for Stasis. 

You will get a personal hand-written letter from Chris, thanking you for your support. 

You will get a personal Skype-to-Skype chat with Chris after Stasis is released.

You will also get an additional 3 digital keys for Stasis.

A name of your choice (a real first, middle and surname) will appear in the game, on the board of executives of Cayne Corporation. Names from this tier will be used in the history and lore of the Stasis universe.
